ValidationRule.description: If the initial reason for contact is disruption related then either "Travel Based Disruption" or "Alternative Disruption" must be selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Disruption or Compensation") && ISBLANK(TEXT(Travel_Based_Disruption__c )) && ISBLANK(TEXT(Alternative_Disruption__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: As the initial reason for contact is disruption related, please select an option for either Travel Based Disruption or Alternative Disruption
